ProfileName: Glenda Boozer "Live, live, live! Life is a ba...
Summary: Very fruity and a distinct honey flavor
text: When I first tasted Lipton To Go Stix Iced Green Tea Mix, I had to go back and check the calorie count; it tastes like honey and fruit, rich and real. The tea and pineapple take a back seat here, but if mango and honey are in the front seat, I have no problem with that. Mango is one of my favorite flavors, and this mix really tastes like mangoes. Yum!
